Public Class ListViewItem Implements ICloneable, ISerializable

summary.span: 表示 控件中的一个项。

span.span: Represents an item in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件是类似于，它显示的项的列表。The control is similar to a in that it displays a list of items. 主要区别是，控件提供不同的方式项数可以由用户查看。The main difference is that the control provides a number of different ways items can be viewed by the user. 类定义外观、 行为和与中显示的项关联的数据控件。The class defines the appearance, behavior, and data associated with an item that is displayed in the control. 对象可以显示在四种不同视图之一中的控件。 objects can be displayed in the control in one of four different views. 可以显示项，为大或小图标或垂直列表中的小图标。Items can be displayed as large or small icons or as small icons in a vertical list. 项目还可以包含与父项相关的信息的子项。Items can also have subitems that contain information that is related to the parent item. 第四个视图，详细信息视图的样式，允许你以具有可以用于标识要显示在子项中的信息的列标题的网格中显示项及其子项。The fourth view style, details view, allows you to display the item and its subitems in a grid with column headers that can be used to identify the information being displayed in a subitem. 属性的大多数类提供了方法来更改中的项显示与之关联的控件。Most of the properties of the class provide ways to change the display of the item in the control it is associated with. ， ，和属性允许您更改项的文本中的显示方式控件。The , , and properties allow you to change how the text of the item is displayed in the control. 属性可以指定用于从加载的映像，分配给控件 (通过设置或属性)。The property allows you to specify the image to load from the that is assigned to the control (by setting the or properties of the ). 项可以显示复选框，以便从类似于一种方法中的用户获取项选择控件。Items can display check boxes in order to obtain item choices from the user in a way similar to a control. 你可以使用属性以确定是否已选中项，或者，选中或清除该复选框，在运行时。You can use the property to determine if an item is checked, or to select or clear the check box at run time. 项可以显示任意数量的子项时属性关联的控件设置为和列定义中的控件。Items can display any number of subitems when the property of the associated control is set to and columns are defined in the of the control. 你可以将某个项的子项添加通过调用方法类。You can add subitems to an item by calling the method of the class. 属性允许你访问类及其成员。The property allows you to gain access to the class and its members. 属性和方法的一些类是特定项的版本中的属性和方法控件。Some of the properties and methods of the class are item-specific versions of properties and methods in the control. 例如，方法类似于是版本的方法，但版本影响仅当前项。For example, the method is similar to the version of the method, but the version affects only the current item. 类还提供了不是新版的方法方法。The class also provides methods that are not versions of methods. 方法将项的文本置于编辑模式以便用户可以更改项的文本 (时属性控件设置为`true`)。The method places the item's text into edit mode so the user can change the item's text (when the property of the control is set to `true`). 方法允许你创建的现有副本对象在其他重用控件。The method allows you to create copies of existing objects to reuse in other controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个还在代码示例中提供的映像中创建对象对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建控件：The example uses the following properties in creating the control: - - - - - - - 你需要将代码添加到和调用中的示例构造函数或窗体上的另一种方法创建的方法。You need to add the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例需要映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. [!code-cpp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性可以更改显示项文本的背景的颜色。You can use the property to change the color displayed behind the item text. 可以使用此属性，如果你想要使用不同的背景和前景颜色组合 (使用要设置的前景色属性) 来区分从另一个项。This property can be used if you want to use different background and foreground color combinations (using the property to set the foreground color) to differentiate one item from another. 例如，你可以设置属性标识未通过验证，或缺少子项信息的项目。For example, you could set the property to to identify items that have failed validation or are missing subitem information. 如果你想要为某项的所有子项使用相同的背景色，设置属性`true`。If you want to use the same background color for all subitems of an item, set the property to `true`. 这将导致的颜色和字体为项目指定要用于所有子项的文本。This will cause the colors and fonts specified for the item to be used for all subitem text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是有效才属性包含项的控件设置为`true`。This property is effective only if the property of the control that contains the item is set to `true`. 可以使用此方法在运行时，若要强制在编辑模式显示项的文本。You can use this method at run time to force the item's text to display in edit mode. 例如，如果在验证用户，编辑的项文本的项失败验证，你可以选择中的项控件并调用方法，以强制用户更改未能通过验证的文本。For example, if you are validating the item text edited by the user, and an item fails validation, you could select the item in the control and call the method to force the user to change the text that failed validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于获取整个项的边框。You can use this method to obtain the bounding rectangle of an entire item. 如果你想要获取整个项的一部分的边框，使用方法。If you want to obtain the bounding rectangle for a portion of the entire item, use the method. 类提供位于控件内的方法，可用于获取任何项的边框。The class provides a method that allows you to get the bounding rectangle of any item located within the control. 返回的边界矩形使用相对于包含当前可见区域的左上角的客户端控件坐标。The returned bounding rectangle uses client control coordinates that are relative to the top-left corner of the currently visible area of the containing . 如果是可滚动和定位，以便不是可见，则坐标返回可以是负数。If the is scrollable and positioned so that the is not visible, the coordinates returned may be negative. 当属性具有的值，边界矩形的宽度是包含的项，不项中的文本的宽度的列的宽度。When the property has a value of , the width of the bounding rectangle is the width of the column containing the item, not the width of the text in the item. 如果集合不包含任何列，则使用默认列宽度 60 个像素。If the collection does not contain any columns, the default column width of 60 pixels is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性很有用才属性控件中是否包含项设置为`true`。This property is useful only if the property of the control the item is contained in is set to `true`. 此属性可用于确定是否该项已检查由用户或通过代码在运行时。You can use this property to determine if the item has been checked by the user or through code at run time. 若要确定已签入的所有项控件，你可以使用属性。To determine all the items that are checked in a control, you can use the property. 若要执行的操作，已选中项时，你可以创建的事件处理程序属性控件。To take action when an item has been checked, you can create an event handler for the property of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个还在代码示例中提供的映像中创建对象对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建控件：The example uses the following properties in creating the control: - - - - - - - 你需要将代码添加到和调用中的示例构造函数或窗体上的另一种方法创建的方法。You need to add the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例需要映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于设置项所属的组。Use this property to set the group to which an item belongs. 您可以将组设置构造函数，也可以使用此属性可以在运行时修改组成员身份。You can also set the group in the constructor, or you can use this property to modify the group membership at run time. 如果将此属性设置为`null`中的组以及集合，则该项将出现在默认组中，具有标头设置为"。If you set this property to `null` and there are groups in the collection, the item will appear in the default group, which has the header label "DefaultGroupSystem.Windows.Forms". 中不包含默认组集合，而且不能更改。The default group is not contained in the collection, and cannot be altered. 它是主要适用于调试以确保所有项已正确都添加到组。It is primarily useful in debugging to ensure that all items have been properly added to groups. > [!NOTE] > 组是仅适用于 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列 ([!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)])。 groups are only available on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family ([!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)]). 有关更多信息，请参见 概述主题。For more information, see the overview topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何属性可以使用的应用程序将组织中按的详细信息视图中的子项值的项。The following code example demonstrates how the property can be used in an application that organizes items by subitem value in the details view. 这种形式是分组的类似于在 Windows 资源管理器中使用的分组。This form of grouping is similar to the grouping used in Windows Explorer. 在示例中，动态创建组。In the example, the groups are created dynamically. 对于每个子项列中，为每个唯一子项值创建一个组。For each subitem column, one group is created for each unique subitem value. 父项列中，为每个唯一的初始字母创建一个组。For the parent item column, one group is created for each unique initial letter. 为每个列创建的组存储在以及子项文本或首字母哈希表中。The groups created for each column are stored in a hash table along with the subitem text or initial letter. 单击列标题时，将检索对应于该列的哈希表。When a column header is clicked, the hash table corresponding to that column is retrieved. 接下来，该列的子项的文本值的用法与哈希表键以检索正确的组的每个项。Next, the subitem text values for that column are used as hash table keys to retrieve the correct group for each item. 项然后分配给组使用属性。The item is then assigned to the group using the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供属性。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性控件中是否包含项设置为`true`，设置此属性的值将添加或从选定项的集合中移除的项。If the property of the control the item is contained in is set to `true`, setting the value of this property adds or removes the item from the set of selected items. 如果属性设置为`false`，设置此属性，以自动选择项的值取消任何其他项中选择控件。If the property is set to `false`, setting the value of this property to select an item automatically cancels the selection for any other items in the control. 若要确定是否选择项，或者若要在运行时选择一个项，你可以使用此属性。You can use this property to determine if an item is selected or to select an item at run time. 你可以访问在选择的所有项控件通过使用属性。You can access all items that are selected in a control by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 显示所选仅当项控件有焦点。Items appear selected only when the control has focus. 若要选择项目以响应用户操作如单击一个按钮，一定要调用除了设置此属性的方法。To select items in response to a user action such as a button click, be sure to call the method in addition to setting this property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和成员。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and members. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码放置在窗体包含名为`ListView1`和位于名为窗体的底部`Button1`。To run the example, place the following code in a form containing a named `ListView1` and a , located toward the bottom of the form, named `Button1`. 调用`InitializeListView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或事件处理方法。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or event-handling method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性允许你指定的索引为分配给属性关联的控件，左侧的项显示的状态图像的存储位置。This property allows you to specify the index into the assigned to the property of the associated control, where the state images to display to the left of the item are stored. 通常，状态图像是选中或清除复选框，或者用于表示的图像选择或清除项的状态。Typically, the state image is a selected or cleared check box or an image that is intended to represent selected or cleared states for the item. 如果为不指定任何值属性，控件显示的默认选择或清除复选框时的控件属性设置为`true`。If no value is specified for the property, the control displays a default selected or cleared check box when the property of the control is set to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 尽管中指定属性可以包含任意数量的图像，和等于或低于 14，可以为任何值将设置的属性，仅在 0 和 1 的索引位置的映像显示为状态图像。Although the specified in the property can contain any number of images, and the property can be set to any value equal to or lower than 14, only the images at index positions 0 and 1 are displayed as state images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用，可以添加子项、 子项中删除和获取的子项的计数。Using the , you can add subitems, remove subitems, and obtain a count of subitems. 可以在集合中的子项中执行的任务的详细信息，请参阅类参考主题。For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the subitems in the collection, see the class reference topics. > [!NOTE] > 中的第一个子项始终是拥有子项的项。The first subitem in the is always the item that owns the subitems. 在执行对子项的操作集合中时，一定要引用而不是 0 到第一个子项进行更改的索引位置 1。When performing operations on subitems in the collection, be sure to reference index position 1 instead of 0 to make changes to the first subitem. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个还在代码示例中提供的映像中创建对象对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建控件：The example uses the following properties in creating the control: - - - - - - - 你需要将代码添加到和调用中的示例构造函数或窗体上的另一种方法创建的方法。You need to add the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例需要映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C.
